alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 25 at 11:43PM EDT until March 27 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers... Great Miami River at Miamitown. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Great Miami River at Miamitown. * WHEN...Until early Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Water approaches summer cottages along the Great Miami River near Miamitown. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:45 PM EDT Saturday the stage was 18.0 feet and falling. The river crested at 20.7 feet Saturday afternoon. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to developments by listening to NOAA Weather Radio. For additional details on river forecasts, visit water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=iln
